articles.author: Grace Hauck, Kayla Jimenez
articles.title: As excessive heat warnings blanket the US: How are Americans coping? - USA TODAY
articles.description: About 80 million people in the U.S., nearly a quarter of the population, may encounter extreme heat this week.
articles.content:
Taking shelter in cooling centers. Flocking to community pools. Cooking breakfast on the pavement. Chilling in a walk-in refrigerator.
Americans across a broad part of the country are coping with a … [+8430 chars]

articles.author: Haley Ott
articles.title: U.S. soldier believed to be in North Korean custody after unauthorized border crossing, officials say - CBS News
articles.description: The U.S. service member crossed the border so quickly that South Korean and American soldiers didn't have time to stop him, according to local media.
articles.content: A U.S. soldier crossed into North Korea "willfully and without authorization" and was believed to be in the custody of the country's forces, U.S. and international officials said Tuesday. The United … [+6820 chars]
